name: 5-dimethylhydantoin (MMDMH)
5-dimethylhydantoin (DMDMH)
FoodContactSubstance: An approximately 1:1 ratio mixture of hydroxymethyl-5,5-dimethylhydantoin (MMDMH) (CAS Reg. No. 27636-82-4) and 1,3-bis(hydroxymethyl)-5,5-dimethylhydantoin (DMDMH) (CAS Reg. No. 6440-58-0), containing up to 8.5 percent by weight dimethylhydantoin.
